test.name: select expressions, functions, operators
test.db_create: CREATE TABLE test_table ( id INT NOT NULL, aa INT NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, mm VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, kk VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
test.db_insert: INSERT INTO test_table ( id, aa, title, mm, kk ) VALUES ( 1, 2, 'dummy', '', 'one' ), ( 10, 3, 'ohai', '7 40', 'ten' )

SELECT id, IF(IN(mm,7),111,222) FROM test
